comments:
Returns a human-readable printout of the current memory allocator statistics for a given device.

This can be useful to display periodically during training, or when handling out-of-memory exceptions.

Arguments: device (torch.device or int, optional): selected device. Returns printout for the current device, given by :func:`~torch.cuda.current_device`, if :attr:`device` is ``None`` (default). abbreviated (bool, optional): whether to return an abbreviated summary (default: False).

.. note:: See :ref:`cuda-memory-management` for more details about GPU memory management.
